pr_title: add a pre plot change type event

timeline.message: add a pre plot change type event

timeline.bodyText: The wilds plot type is not actually wilderness. TownBlocks that don't exist at all are wilderness. getOldType() will probably never return null as TownBlocks always have a type, even if it is the default RESIDENTIAL type.
timeline.author: LlmDl

timeline.bodyText: You can drop the oldType from this.
timeline.author: LlmDl

timeline.bodyText: Doesn't need oldType, as this can be gotten via the TownBlock in the event.
timeline.author: LlmDl

timeline.bodyText: Please change variables to townBlock and townBlockType, for readability.
timeline.author: LlmDl

timeline.message: add a plot pre change type event

timeline.bodyText: I missed it before but it's probably a good idea to pass along the resident or player who is changing the plot type, to make the event more usable. After that's done I think this will be ready to go.
timeline.author: LlmDl
